details.p: Mark Curphey has begun scheduling the project using Mr. Project which can be found here. The general project defines the general schedule for the software development, but not any of the overall project management activities. These will be defined more clearly later.

issues.item: Finalize detailed schedule and develop project plan.

traceability.impacted-by: Description of how this workproduct is impacted by the "impacted-by" workproduct.
traceability.impacts: Description of how this workprodcuct impacts the "impacts" workproduct.
